Constructor Detail

public ComicDatabase(java.lang.String dataFileName)
Creates the ComicDatabase with the data file stored in the specified location.

ComicDatabase

public ComicDatabase()
Creates the ComicDatabase with the data file stored in the default location.

Method Detail

loadDatabase

public void loadDatabase()
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Loads the file specified by DATA_FILE, and reads in the list of ComicSites and ComicStrips. WARNING: Calling this method clears the list of comics in order to load the new list!

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException
See Also:
Date

saveDatabase

public void saveDatabase(java.util.ArrayList<ComicSite> newComics)
Saves the current list of ComicSites to the data file specified by DATA_FILE. WARNING: Calling this method clears the list of comics in order to save the new list!

Parameters:
newComics - List of currently loaded/displayed ComicSites and ComicStrips.

saveDatabase

public void saveDatabase()
Saves the current list of ComicSites to the data file specified by DATA_FILE.

getAllComics

public java.util.ArrayList<ComicSite> getAllComics()
Fetches the loaded list of all comics.

Returns:
An ArrayList of ComicSites, each of which has the proper image loaded.

getSaveDate

public java.util.Date getSaveDate()
Fetches the date when comics were last saved.

Returns:
The Date pbject representing when the comics were last saved.

sortComicList

public void sortComicList()
Re-sorts the list, presumably after ComicSite's sortMethod has changed.

getNextComic

public ComicSite getNextComic()
Moves to and returns the next ComicSite for display. Circles to the first if the current site is the last in the list.

Returns:
The next ComicSite in the list, circling to the first if necessary, or null if the list is empty.

getPreviousComic

public ComicSite getPreviousComic()
Moves to and returns the previous ComicSite for display. Circles to the last if the current site is the first in the list.

Returns:
The next Comic Site in the list, circling to the first if necessary, or null if the list is empty.

getCurrentComic

public ComicSite getCurrentComic()
Returns the current comic as a ComicSite.

Returns:
The current ComicSite in the list, or null if the list is empty.

hasComics

public boolean hasComics()
Returns true if the database has any comics stored.

Returns:
true if the comic list is NOT empty.

addComic

public void addComic(ComicSite cs)
Adds a ComicSite to the list.

Parameters:
cs - The ComicSite to be added

removeComic

public void removeComic()
Removes a ComicSite from the list
